data.name: Pandemonium
data.tooltip: Unleash a wave of dark energy that travels forward from the caster, inflicting <d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraPandemonium_Damage.amount" style="Bold"/> (+<d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraPandemonium_DamageTagBonus.bonus" style="Bold"/> vs light) damage to enemy ground units and stunning them for <d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraPandemonium_Stunned.duration"/> seconds.
